product_name: The North Face NFZ Shell Pants - Men's
long_description: The NFZ insulated pants by The North Face offer Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection and sturdy construction to keep you dry day after day in your pursuit of powder and perfect lines. Rugged 2-layer Gore-Tex laminate and seam sealed construction delivers waterproof protection and breathable comfort for dependable performance through winter. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Clip-in tabs let you connect the pants to compatible jacket powder skirts (jacket sold separately) for an integrated, protective barrier. Zippered thigh vents let you control airflow for comfort; mesh gussets help keep snow out when vents are open. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit; zippered, snap-closure fly. Water-resistant zippered hand pockets and cargo pockets. The North Face NFZ pants feature reinforced cuffs that which resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis; stretch gussets behind cuffs help keep snow out.
